page.title: 08Yarnbury Benefice
page.content: I am the Rector of five churches, Steeple Langford, Little Langford, Wylye, Fisherton de-la-Mere and Stockton. My main duty is to conduct services on Sundays,usually two Holy Communions,a Matins and an Evensong.I also christen and marry people and bury the dead.I preach sermons,to guide and teach those who hear me.I also try to teach the Christian faith through the parish magazine.I visit the sick in hospital or in their homes,and deal with people's problems. In all this work I have many other people who are ready and willing to share in the work of running the parishes. My job could be seen as that of a shepherd looking after his flock or a captain of a team.
